statements: SELECT * FROM customer_inquiries ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, inquiry_text, response_text FROM customer_inquiries WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT inquiry_id, response_text FROM customer_inquiries WHERE inquiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_inquiries FROM customer_inquiries GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_inquiries WHERE response_text LIKE '%satisfied%' ORDER BY response_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_inquiries WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC
SELECT inquiry_id, inquiry_text FROM customer_inquiries WHERE inquiry_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT customer_id, MAX(inquiry_date) AS latest_inquiry_date FROM customer_inquiries GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_inquiries WHERE response_text IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM customer_inquiries WHERE inquiry_text LIKE '%urgent%'
SELECT * FROM customer_inquiries;
SELECT inquiry_id, customer_id, inquiry_date FROM customer_inquiries WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM responses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT inquiry_id, inquiry_date, inquiry_text FROM customer_inquiries WHERE inquiry_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT MAX(inquiry_id) AS max_inquiry_id FROM customer_inquiries;
SELECT * FROM customer_inquiries WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(inquiry_id) AS total_inquiries FROM customer_inquiries GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_inquiries > 2;

SELECT ci.inquiry_id, ci.inquiry_date, r.response_date, r.response_text FROM customer_inquiries ci JOIN responses r ON ci.inquiry_id = r.inquiry_id WHERE ci.customer_id = 200 ORDER BY ci.inquiry_date ASC, r.response_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(inquiry_date) AS last_inquiry_date FROM customer_inquiries GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT ci.inquiry_id, ci.inquiry_text, r.response_text FROM customer_inquiries ci LEFT JOIN responses r ON ci.inquiry_id = r.inquiry_id WHERE r.response_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM inquiries;
SELECT customer_id, inquiry_text FROM inquiries;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM responses;
SELECT inquiry_id, inquiry_text, inquiry_date FROM inquiries;
SELECT * FROM inquiries;
SELECT customer_id, inquiry_text FROM inquiries WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM responses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, inquiry_text, response_text FROM customers c INNER JOIN inquiries i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id INNER JOIN responses r ON i.inquiry_id = r.inquiry_id WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries;
SELECT template_id, response_text FROM ResponseTemplates WHERE category = 'Customer Support';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM AutomationTasks ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT assignment_id, assigned_to, assignment_date FROM TaskAssignments WHERE assignment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, inquiry_date, inquiry_text FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT inquiry_id, inquiry_text FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE inquiry_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM AutomationTasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM TaskAssignments WHERE assignment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT response_text FROM ResponseTemplates WHERE category = 'General' ORDER BY template_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries;
SELECT inquiry_id, customer_id, inquiry_text FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE inquiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT response_text FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT agent_name, department FROM Agents WHERE email LIKE '%@company.com%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT inquiry_id, inquiry_text, inquiry_date FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE inquiry_date >= '2021-01-01';

SELECT Customers.customer_name, CustomerInquiries.inquiry_text, Responses.response_text FROM Customers JOIN CustomerInquiries ON Customers.customer_id = CustomerInquiries.customer_id JOIN Responses ON CustomerInquiries.inquiry_id = Responses.inquiry_id;
SELECT agent_name, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM Agents JOIN Responses ON Agents.agent_id = Responses.agent_id GROUP BY agent_name;
SELECT Products.product_name, Products.price, Agents.agent_name FROM Products JOIN Agents ON Products.product_id = Agents.agent_id WHERE Products.price < 100.00;
